hero.subtitle: BSc in Mathematics 路 Programming 路 Data Analysis

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: Mathematics graduate with a strong background in programming, data analysis and optimisation. I am particularly interested in applying mathematical methods to real-world problems, as well as in the development of algorithms and computational models.
about.paragraph2: During my degree, I have worked with Python, R, Java and MATLAB in academic contexts related to data mining, numerical analysis and graph theory.

dropout.title: Student dropout prediction
dropout.desc: Exploratory data analysis and development of a predictive model aimed at identifying patterns and risk factors associated with student dropout.

metro.title: Madrid Metro network analysis
metro.tags: Network analysis 路 SQL and R
metro.desc: Modelling of the Madrid Metro system to study connectivity, critical stations, optimal routes and network fragmentation using graph theory and network analysis.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you are interested in my profile or would like to discuss a project, feel free to get in touch.
